attributes.action: Ban any use of airport body scanners due to their illigality and the fact they are unessicary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people of the united kingdon who are not buying into this phoney threat of terror and can see right through this New World Order police state are refusing to use these scanners as they are little more than another tool of oppression without any grounds of legality. we understand that this government will refuse this petition as they do not work for us the people, but the corporations of the eliete. this matters little to us, as by default this makes your governence illegitimate and therefore there are no lawful grounds for forcing people to succumb to such blatent abuse of power. as such a full scale boycott of air travel will be in the pipeline, and when (not if) your pay oligarchs decide to tell you o bring these into train stations etc, we will boycot them too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
